WOlfblade::

She took the bed and lay down. She folded her hands behind her head 
and closed her optics. She smiled at his reaction. Sure she was 
flirting a bit. She stopped smiling and started to frown as she 
realized what was happening. She was starting to like him. She shook 
her head and told her self she would have to stop and right now.  She 
remembered how many friends she had lost in the past wars.  She 
decided, for the sake of her and her new friend, she would not allow 
herself to get attatched.  She would have to stop having fun and 
start keeping her mind on the job. She rolled her head over and 
looked at the sleeping Malice. She smiled and thought how hard it 
would be to really stop liking him.  She closed her optics and went 
to sleep. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> "Oh yes!" Malice said sarcastically,"I have been dying to know 
that!  I didn't think I could go on without that information!  Oh, 
what a revelation."
> Malice chuckled to himself and walked to his room.  He climbed in 
the hammock, sparing the bed if Wolfblade decided to accept the free 
bed.  He wormed around in the net, finally getting comfotable.  He 
drifted to sleep shortly thereafter.
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She decided perhaps he was right. "Well, perhaps a nap. But back to 
> your room? You just want to find out if I snore in wolf mode. Then 
> you'll have black mail material on me to hold against me the rest 
of 
> my life. Well pal, I don't think so. I don't snore, so there."
> 
> "In the name of God, I banish these souls of the evil undead into 
damnation.  May God have mercy, for I have none.  In Jesus' Holy 
Name, Amen." -Rawl, Hellsing-RPG
